message: Let's be fair, Bob. Take this offer and we both walk away happy.
Let's split it evenly, Alice. This way we both get a fair share.
Bob, time is running out! My last offer was more than fair. Take this one before inflation eats away at your potential gains.
Alice, I'm willing to be more flexible. Let's split it 60/40, with me taking slightly more. We're both better off than if we keep rejecting each other's offers.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous. I'm taking a small hit to end this now.  Take it or leave it.
